resources.string: This activity will show playing music page and all the controls. Click on back button to go back.
Integration of Google Pay API for payment of subscription is handled here. Payment API integrated here is \'com.google.android. gms:play-services-wallet:11.4.0\', Click on back button to go back
This activity will show list of songs user added as favorite song. Click on back button to go back. Click on any song to play it.
This layout will contain songs which are frequently played by user. Click on back button to go back. Click on any song to play it.
This activity will contain all the playlist created by user. Click on back button to go back. Click on any song to play it.
This activity will contain all the newly added songs in music library, Click on back button to go back. Click on any song to play it.
This activity will contain entire music library and will be launcher activity. Click on any song to play it.
